content.rendered:
Directed by Trivikram Srinivas.

Written by Trivikram Srinivas.

Cast N.T. Rama Rao Jr.(Veera Raghava Reddy). Pooja Hegde(Aravindha). Jagapathi Babu(Basireddy). Naveen Chandra(Bala Reddy). Supriya Pathak(Jeji). Eesha Rebba(Sunandha). V.K. Naresh(Saradhi). Sunil(Neelambari (as Suneel)). Nagendra Babu(Narappa Reddy). Ram Charan Teja(Prateek (as Charan Ram)). Subhalekha Sudhakar(Sudarshan Reddy). Devayani(Suguna). Easwari Rao(Basireddy’s Wife). Brahmaji(Marappa). Shatru(Subbadu). Rao Ramesh(Krishna Reddy). Lakshmi Gopalaswamy(Aravinda’s Mother). Vinay Varma(Timma Reddy). Sharath Lohitashwa(Lakshma Reddy). Narra Srinivas(Ramireddy). Sithara(Varalakshmi). Pammi Sai(Sudarshan). Srinivasa Reddy(Balu). Ravi Prakash(Oosanna). Rangadham(Oobaa). Ananth(Mechanic). Aadarsh Balakrishna(Henchman). Hari Teja(Nagamani, Raghava’s henchman’s wife) .Mahesh Achanta.Rajsekhar Aningi.Chammak Chandra.Meghashree.Melkote. Raghav Rudra Mulpuru(Aravindha’s admirer).Prabhu.Manik Reddy.Ayyappa P. Sharma. Santosh Kumar Yadav((as Santhosh Yadav)).Veera Ravi Kumar Yalla

Language Telugu.

Producers Dibyendu Roy Chowdhury. Ivano Fucci. S. Radha Krishna. P.D.V. Prasad. Michele Saragoni. Suryadevara Naga Vamsi.

Production Haarika & Hassine Creations.
